name: Spear of Shojin
simpleDescription: Reduce damage taken from champions by a flat amount. Attack while near multiple enemy champions to increase this amount for a short time.

passives.name: Focused Will
passives.effects: Dealing {{tip|ability damage}} or {{tip|pet damage}}, sourced from a non-innate {{tip|ability}}, generates a stack for 6 seconds, stacking up to 4 times. For each stack, your {{tip|ability damage}}, {{tip|pet damage}} and {{tip|proc damage}}, sourced from a non-[[item]], gain 3% increased damage, for a total increase of 12% at '''maximum''' stacks.
